typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		InvoiceID as string,
		VendorID as string,
		InvoiceNumber as string,
		InvoiceDate as string,
		InvoiceTotal as string,
		PaymentTotal as string,
		CreditTotal as string,
		TermsID as string,
		InvoiceDueDate as string,
		PaymentDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> invoices1source
invoices1source alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> MarkUpsert
